An amazing game, one of my favourites. The puzzles are great, the story is great, the music is great, the ending is great, the co-op (of what I've played) is great, it's all great, I loved it. Please play this, it's an amazing game, and I loved every second of it.

TL;DR, Amazing game, please play it.

This game is so good.

If you are still in doubt, dont think twice when its on sale.
De los mejores juegos que he jugado en mi vida -u-
O Portal 2 parece um scape room, recomendo!
ya know the whole game i kinda thought it was odd that there was no limit to how far i could shoot the portal gun. now it makes sense. a lot more sense.

somehow I have almost 60 hours on this game...
Greatest 60 hours of my life though.

por donde comienzo? tenia mis dudas cuando empeze a jugarlo y al inicio me parecio aburrido pero porque lo estaba viendo de la forma incorrecta, Portal no es un juego de shooter o accion al 100% (a los que normalmente estoy acostumbrado) es un juego que tiene su propia personalidad ya que es completamente original a diferencia de otros juegos como counter, left 4 dead o TF2. Al igual que su primera parte va de resolver puzzles pero esta vez con una historia mas extendida y que te atrapa desde el principio, no solo se trata de disparar a lo loco sino tambien de usar la cabeza y muchas vecez usar tu creatividad para resolverlos.

-Lo malo: algunos puzzles te tomaran algo mas de tiempo resolverlos (lo cual habeces puede ser tedioso) y tendras q ser muy observador para saber como avanzar en ciertas partes del mapa, porque no hay nadie que te guie.

Mi calificacion: 7.5/10 (sigue siendo un juego entretenido y la satisfaccion  al resolver uno de los puzzles dificiles es indescriptible)
mon cerveau ait briser sa ma donner mal a la t√™te mais bon jeu!

El mejor juego de puzzles y plataformas

el que lea esto es gay

One of my favorite games of all time. I play it over and over. The dialogue alone is worth it, and the gameplay is addictive.

"DO YOU KNOW WHO I AM? I'M THE GUY WHO'S GOING TO BURN YOUR HOUSE DOWN! WITH THE LEMONS! I'M GOING TO GET MY ENGINEERS TO INVENT A COMBUSTIBLE LEMON THAT BURNS YOUR HOUSE DOWN!"

"Look at you sailing through the air majestically. Like an eagle. Piloting a blimp."

"I tell you what, if you gave me the choice, this is the way I'd want to go out. Mashed with dignity."
i love getting degraded by the robot

Great story, great humor, great puzzles. A classic and without a $60 price tag.

Amazing game. Challenging puzzles, great story and super funny.  Although I think a playthrough of the first game would greatly help new players with the story, it can be played on its own.

A great sequel to a great game, Portal 2 delivers on more of what was done in the previous Portal by instead having your player character Chell being helped by a new robot character name Wheatley. Just like in Portal, you carry on one-sided conversations with NPCs while solving puzzles to escape from your new situation. This game also has a co-op feature for playing with friends, though it follows a different story that parallels the main one.
it good portal gun go brmmrmmmmmm
DUDE THIS GAME IS SO GOOD!! One of my favorite games, love wheatley so much. Would pick him up and put him in my pocket and take him on little adventures. W game 20/20.

I love this amazing game! It is one of my favorites. If you love puzzle games, you must try this one, but only after playing the first Portal game.  It is very challenging, but incredibly rewarding. I love how immersive the game feels as you engage on solving the puzzles that Wheatley has set for you. Spoiler Alert! ............... I  enjoyed a lot how the game progresses as it take you to the origins of Aperture Sciences Enrichment Center, while reuniting with your clever, and sarcastic frenemy.

I probably have double - triple the time I would've if I wasn't so content on never getting a hint on how to beat a puzzle but it was slightly worth it. Great game though 10/10 genuinely the funniest game(s) I've ever played
Incredibly noice, play the first game before this tho, not just to understand the story but it also lets you enjoy portal 2 more.

The puzzles are creative and make you use your brain, but aren't too hard to really make you ragequit. Nice change of pace from most modern games, and the graphics are reasonable for the genre.
